author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Chennai City traffic police have announced that traffic diversions for Kaanum Pongal would be effected based on the situation on Sunday.

A press statement said that while normal traffic would be allowed on Kamarajar Salai as long as possible, if a large number of public congregate near the Labour statue, then vehicles from the north would be diverted at War Memorial towards Flag Staff Road, Anna Salai, GP Road, Tower Clock and Dr. Radhakrishnan Salai.

Vehicles from Adyar

Vehicles from Adyar would be diverted at Kannagi statue towards Bharathi Salai, Bells Road and Wallajah Road to reach their destination.

The Bharathi Salai stretch would be made one way with entry from the Kannagi statue and no entry from the Bells Road junction.
title: Kaanum Pongal: traffic diversions likely
